definition: commune member (PRC, 1958-1985)/member of a society (or other organization)

sentences.english: In which of the three areas of membership development do clubs in the district need improvement?
sentences.chinese: 地区内的扶轮社在社员发展的三方面需要改善？

sentences.english: In your experience, what benefits has recruitment brought to your club?
sentences.chinese: 在你经验中，于贵社吸收新社员时有何益处？

sentences.english: Request that all clubs participate in a PolioPlus Partners project.
sentences.chinese: 拟定一个合适的新社员训练计划并与所有扶轮社分享。

sentences.english: How can you use public relations as a district-level membership tool?
sentences.chinese: 您如何运用公共关系来做为地区层级的社员工具呢？

sentences.english: The commune members went at the building of a dam with a will.
sentences.chinese: 社员们干劲十足地建筑一道堤坝。

sentences.english: Keeping current club members is just as important as bringing in new ones, Dochterman said.
sentences.chinese: 留住现有的社员与引进新社员同等重要，陶德曼说。

sentences.english: Keeping current club members is just as important as bringing in new ones, Dochterman said.
sentences.chinese: 留住现有的社员与引进新社员同等重要，陶德曼说。

sentences.english: Then those Communards who had so far escaped were herded together and given mock trials.
sentences.chinese: 幸存下来的公社社员们被集体模拟审判。

sentences.english: Ensure that a significant number of club members and their partners participate in new service projects.
sentences.chinese: 务使有相当多的社员及其伴侣參加新的服务计划。

sentences.english: How can you generate enthusiasm in your club for recruiting new members?
sentences.chinese: 在你经验中，于贵社吸收新社员时有何益处？

sentences.english: Who in your club can educate new members?
sentences.chinese: 贵社里有谁可以教育新社员？

sentences.english: Report on the progress of Interact and Rotaract in the district.
sentences.chinese: 提醒秘书们缴交社员出席报告至地区总监。

sentences.english: What are some specific challenges Rotary faces in your district when recruiting new members?
sentences.chinese: 在召募新社员时，扶轮在贵地区面临哪些特定的困难？

sentences.english: What are three ways to increase membership in your district?
sentences.chinese: 请举出三种可以增加贵地区社员的方法？

sentences.english: The member right originated in ancient German law, and became established in the modern times.
sentences.chinese: 社员权产生于日耳曼法，正式确立于近代。

sentences.english: The member's congress determines a resolution of disincorporation.
sentences.chinese: 二社员大会之解散决议。

definition: educated youth (sent to work in farms during the Cultural Revolution)
cooperative/workers' or agricultural producers' cooperative etc

pinyin: nong2 ye4 sheng1 chan3 he2 zuo4 she4

definition: branch secretary/secretary of a branch of the Communist Party or the Communist Youth League/abbr. for 支部書記|支部书记
farmer's cooperative/abbr. for 農民協會|农民协会
our peasant friends (political term used in the early years of the Old Democratic Revolution, 1840-1919)/(Tw) (coll.) farmer
fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
work point (measure of work completed in a rural commune in the PRC during the planned economy era)
